definitions.definition: Of or relating to one or more rudiments .
examples: I have only a rudimentary grasp of chemistry.

definitions.definition: Basic ; minimal ; with less than, or only the minimum , necessary .
examples: His grasp of rudimentary English allowed him at least to do the shopping.
His rudimentary driving skills meant that he was a danger on the road.

main_definition: Of or relating to one or more rudiments .
secondary_definitions: Basic ; minimal ; with less than, or only the minimum , necessary .
